whats a good bash editor?: is nano gui or is that straight from terminal?
is there a gui one recommended?
if you're looking for someone to do general text editing you might look at Eddie
gedit isn't bad, or kate, just wondering if there is others that may be recommended
Eddie is kinda neat, does syntax highlighting, and most compelling, has a nice "shell" kinda window (the worksheet) where you can test your scripts in situ
Might do what you need, it's very lean, but I've used it for a long old time.
